name: Berry Lemonade
description: Refreshing lemonade blended with a mix of ripe berries for a sweet-tart twist

name: Black Russian
description: A bold and smooth cocktail made with vodka and coffee liqueur, served over ice

name: Blue Hawaiian
description: A tropical blend of rum, blue curaçao, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, served over ice with a vibrant island flair

name: Brandy Alexander
description: A rich and creamy classic cocktail made with brandy, dark crème de cacao, and fresh cream—smooth and indulgent

name: Citrus Sparkler
description: A zesty and refreshing mix of citrus juices topped with sparkling water for a bright, bubbly finish

name: Dracontomelon Juice
description: A uniquely tangy and slightly sweet juice made from tropical dracontomelon fruit, offering a refreshing burst of exotic flavor

name: Fuzzy Navel
description: A sweet and fruity cocktail made with peach schnapps and orange juice—light, refreshing, and easy to enjoy

name: Tequila Sunrise
description: A vibrant and fruity cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine, layered to resemble a beautiful sunris

name: Tom Collins
description: A classic cocktail made with gin, fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, and soda water, served over ice for a crisp, refreshing drink

name: French Martini
description: A sophisticated and fruity cocktail made with vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur, and pineapple juice, shaken to perfection for a smooth, sweet finish

name: Kamikaze
description: A bold and tangy cocktail made with vodka, lime juice, and triple sec, delivering a sharp, clean taste with a punch

name: Russian Standard Vodka
description: A premium vodka from Russia, distilled with the finest ingredients for a smooth, crisp flavor. Ideal for sipping or mixing in cocktails

name: Kombucha
description: A refreshing, fermented tea with a tangy taste and natural effervescence, packed with probiotics and antioxidants. Available in a variety of flavors

name: Rusty Nail
description: A smooth and warming cocktail made with Scotch whisky and Drambuie, delivering a rich blend of honey, herbs, and malted flavor

name: Sazerac
description: A timeless New Orleans classic made with rye whiskey, Peychaud’s bitters, a touch of absinthe, and a sugar cube, stirred to create a bold and aromatic drink

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A stylish and tart cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and fresh lime juice, shaken to perfection and served with a lime twist

name: Jalapeño Margarita
description: A spicy twist on the classic, made with tequila, fresh lime juice, triple sec, and muddled jalapeño for a bold kick, balanced by a hint of sweetness

name: Sidecar
description: A classic cocktail made with cognac, orange liqueur, and fresh lemon juice, shaken and served in a sugar-rimmed glass for a tart and smooth finish

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A smooth and refreshing cocktail made with bourbon, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup, shaken to perfection and served over ice with a cherry or lemon twist

name: Piña colada
description: A tropical favorite made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, blended to creamy perfection and served with a cherry and pineapple slice

name: Long Island Iced Tea
description: A bold and refreshing mix of vodka, rum, tequila, gin, triple sec, sour mix, and a splash of cola, creating a flavorful, well-balanced cocktail

name: Bloody Mary
description: A savory cocktail made with vodka, tomato juice, and a blend of spices, garnished with celery, olives, and a wedge of lime for the perfect brunch companion

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing and crisp cocktail made with rum, fresh mint, lime juice, sugar, and soda water, muddled together and served over ice

name: Espresso
description: A rich and bold shot of finely brewed coffee, offering a deep, intense flavor with a smooth crema on top

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk, topped with a dusting of cocoa or cinnamon for a smooth, rich flavor

name: Chai Latte
description: A warm and comforting drink made with spiced chai tea concentrate and steamed milk, creating a perfect balance of sweet and aromatic flavors

name: Braised Chicken Legs With Grapes and Fennel
description: Succulent chicken legs slowly braised with sweet grapes, aromatic fennel, white wine, and herbs, creating a savory-sweet harmony of flavors

name: Tamales con Elote y Chile Poblano
description: Traditional masa tamales filled with sweet corn and roasted poblano peppers, steamed in corn husks and served with a side of salsa verde

name: Baatingan w Kusaa Bil Banadoura
description: Delicately hollowed eggplants and zucchini stuffed with a savory blend of rice, herbs, and spices, slowly simmered in a rich, garlicky tomato sauce—a comforting Middle Eastern classic

name: Seared Scallops With Brown Butter And Lemon Pan Sauce
description: Perfectly seared sea scallops served with a nutty brown butter and bright lemon pan sauce, finished with fresh herbs for a refined, elegant flavor

name: Seared Scallops With Basil Risotto
description: Golden-seared sea scallops served atop a creamy basil-infused risotto, finished with a drizzle of lemon oil and shaved Parmesan for a balanced, aromatic dish

name: Pozole Verde Con Hongos
description: A vibrant and hearty Mexican stew made with hominy and tender mushrooms in a rich green broth of tomatillos, poblano peppers, and fresh herbs—comforting, flavorful, and fully plant-based

name: Potato Flake Gnocchi
description: Soft, pillowy gnocchi made from rehydrated potato flakes, gently boiled and sautéed with brown butter, sage, and Parmesan for a simple yet satisfying dish

name: Mast Biryani
description: A festive and aromatic layered rice dish made with long-grain basmati rice, seasonal vegetables, fragrant spices, saffron, and herbs—slow-cooked to perfection and served with raita

name: Instant Pot Lamb Haleem
description: A rich, slow-cooked stew of tender lamb, lentils, and cracked wheat, infused with warm spices and finished with ghee—made in the Instant Pot for deep flavor and velvety texture in less time

name: Habanero BBQ Shrimp
description: Juicy shrimp sautéed in a bold, smoky barbecue sauce with a fiery habanero kick—sweet, spicy, and irresistibly flavorful

name: Grilled Pork Spareribs With Soda Bottle Barbecue Sauce
description: Tender, fall-off-the-bone pork spareribs, grilled to perfection and smothered in a tangy, sweet soda bottle barbecue sauce for a uniquely flavorful twist

name: Grilled Jerk Tofu and Plantains With Mango Salsa
description: Spicy, smoky jerk-marinated tofu grilled to perfection and paired with sweet caramelized plantains, topped with a fresh and tangy mango salsa for a vibrant and satisfying dish

name: Grilled Coconut Shrimp With Shishito Peppers
description: Succulent shrimp coated in a crispy coconut crust, grilled to perfection and served alongside blistered shishito peppers for a sweet, savory, and slightly smoky combination

name: Gado Gado
description: A traditional Indonesian salad made with a variety of fresh, crunchy vegetables, boiled eggs, tofu, and tempeh, all drizzled with a rich, tangy peanut sauce for a satisfying, flavorful meal

name: Fish Tacos al Pastor
description: Grilled white fish marinated in a smoky adobo sauce, served in soft corn tortillas with pineapple, cilantro, and a tangy salsa verde for a fresh, bold, and flavorful twist on the classic taco

name: Double-Stack Mushroom and Chicken Cheeseburger
description: Two juicy grilled chicken patties topped with sautéed mushrooms, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a smoky aioli, served on a toasted brioche bun for a savory, indulgent bite

name: Classic Sole Meunière
description: A delicate, pan-fried sole fillet, seasoned with lemon and parsley, and finished with a rich brown butter sauce for a light yet flavorful classic French dish

name: Clam Toasts with Pancetta
description: Toasted baguette slices topped with a savory blend of fresh clams, crispy pancetta, garlic, and herbs, finished with a drizzle of olive oil and a touch of lemon zest for a perfect balance of flavors

name: Circus Cured-Salmon
description: Delicately cured salmon with a unique blend of spices and citrus, served with a tangy mustard-dill sauce and garnished with pickled vegetables for a bold, savory starter

name: Cedar-Plank Salmon
description: Fresh, perfectly grilled salmon fillet cooked on a cedar plank, infusing it with a smoky aroma and complemented by a tangy glaze of honey and mustard, served with roasted vegetables and a lemon wedge

name: Cauliflower Bolognese
description: A hearty, plant-based twist on the classic Bolognese, featuring finely chopped cauliflower simmered in a rich tomato sauce with herbs, garlic, and red wine, served over pasta or zucchini noodles for a satisfying, flavorful dish

name: Broken Lasagna With Parmesan and All Peas
description: A rustic twist on traditional lasagna, featuring torn lasagna sheets layered with a creamy blend of ricotta, Parmesan, and sweet peas, baked to perfection for a comforting, savory dish

name: Chicken Escabèche
description: A flavorful and tangy dish featuring tender chicken marinated in a vinegar-based sauce with onions, garlic, carrots, and spices, served chilled or at room temperature for a perfect balance of sour, savory, and aromatic flavors

name: Beer-Steamed Mussels With Chorizo
description: Fresh mussels steamed in a rich and savory beer broth, complemented by spicy chorizo, garlic, and fresh herbs, served with crusty bread for dipping

name: Coq au Vin With Cocoa Powder
description: A rich and hearty French dish featuring chicken braised in red wine, bacon, mushrooms, onions, and a hint of cocoa powder, creating a deep, complex flavor profile with earthy and savory notes

name: Pork Tenderloin with Golden Beets
description: Tender, perfectly roasted pork tenderloin paired with sweet, earthy golden beets, finished with a balsamic glaze for a dish that balances savory, sweet, and slightly tangy flavors

name: Aborrajados
description: A Colombian appetizer featuring ripe plantains stuffed with cheese and fried to golden perfection, offering a sweet and savory flavor combination that's crispy on the outside and meltingly soft on the inside

name: Antojitos
description: A delightful selection of Mexican street food-inspired appetizers, including mini quesadillas, crispy taquitos, elote (Mexican street corn), and spicy salsas, perfect for sharing and bursting with bold flavors

name: Beyaynetu
description: A traditional Ethiopian vegetarian platter featuring a variety of flavorful dishes, such as lentils, stewed vegetables, and sautéed greens, served with injera, a spongy flatbread, for a hearty, plant-based meal

name: Bò lá lốt
description: A popular Vietnamese appetizer featuring seasoned ground beef wrapped in betel leaves, grilled to perfection, and served with vermicelli noodles, fresh herbs, and a savory dipping sauce for a bold, aromatic flavor

name: Bruschetta Trio
description: A delightful assortment of three classic Italian bruschetta: ripe tomatoes with basil and balsamic, roasted red peppers with garlic and olive tapenade, and creamy ricotta with honey and toasted walnuts, all served on freshly toasted baguette slices

name: Caesar Salad
description: A crisp and refreshing salad featuring fresh romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, shaved Parmesan, and tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing with a hint of garlic and anchovy for extra depth

name: Cantık Pidesi
description: A traditional Turkish flatbread, lightly crisped and topped with a savory mixture of minced meat, onions, and spices, baked to perfection for a deliciously satisfying dish

name: Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing Italian classic made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, finished with a sprinkle of sea salt and balsamic glaze for a simple yet flavorful bite

name: Ceviche
description: A fresh and zesty dish featuring seafood (typically shrimp or white fish) marinated in citrus juice with onions, cilantro, and a touch of chili for a refreshing, tangy flavor. Served with crispy tortilla chips or on a bed of lettuce for a light, flavorful appetizer

name: Chả giò
description: Vietnamese crispy spring rolls filled with a savory mixture of ground pork, shrimp, mushrooms, and vermicelli noodles, all wrapped in rice paper and deep-fried to a golden crisp. Served with a tangy dipping sauce

name: Conchitas a la parmesana
description: A delicious Peruvian appetizer featuring tender scallops baked in their shells, topped with Parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, and a hint of garlic, then broiled to golden perfection

name: Fried Calamari
description: Crispy, golden-fried calamari served with a side of tangy marinara sauce and a zesty lemon wedge for a perfect balance of flavors and textures

name: Fritto Misto
description: A delightful Italian seafood and vegetable platter featuring a mix of shrimp, calamari, and seasonal vegetables, all lightly battered and fried to crispy perfection, served with a side of marinara sauce and lemon wedges for a flavorful bite

name: Gambas al Ajillo
description: A classic Spanish dish featuring succulent shrimp sautéed in olive oil with garlic, red pepper flakes, and a touch of parsley, served sizzling and accompanied by warm bread to soak up the flavorful sauce

name: Gamjajeon
description: A traditional Korean dish featuring crispy, savory potato pancakes made with grated potatoes, onions, and a simple batter, pan-fried until golden brown and served with a soy-based dipping sauce for a flavorful and satisfying appetizer

name: Guotie
description: A popular Chinese dish featuring pan-fried dumplings filled with ground pork and vegetables, perfectly crispy on the bottom and tender on top, served with a savory soy-based dipping sauce

name: Hummus
description: A smooth and creamy Middle Eastern dip made from blended chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon juice, served with warm pita bread or crunchy vegetables for dipping

name: Kokoreç
description: A traditional Turkish street food made from lamb intestines, marinated with herbs and spices, grilled to perfection, and served in a warm, soft pita with a sprinkle of chili flakes for an aromatic, savory experience

name: Maakouda
description: A Moroccan dish of crispy, golden-brown potato cakes seasoned with garlic, cumin, and coriander, often served as a snack or appetizer with a side of spicy harissa or tangy yogurt for dipping

name: Machas a la Parmesana
description: A delicious Chilean dish featuring tender razor clams topped with Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs, then baked until golden and bubbling, offering a savory and slightly smoky flavor with every bite

name: Mutabal
description: A smoky and creamy Middle Eastern dip made from roasted eggplant, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil, served with warm pita or fresh vegetables for dipping

name: Pastrami Roll
description: A savory roll filled with tender, thinly sliced pastrami, complemented by melted Swiss cheese and tangy mustard, all wrapped in a soft, warm roll for a satisfying and flavorful bite

name: Poke
description: A Hawaiian-inspired dish featuring fresh, sushi-grade tuna or salmon, marinated in soy sauce, sesame oil, and seasonings, served over rice with toppings like avocado, cucumber, seaweed, and a drizzle of spicy mayo for a refreshing, flavorful bowl

name: Spicy Tuna Tartare
description: Fresh, sushi-grade tuna diced and mixed with a spicy mayo, sesame oil, and a hint of soy sauce, served with avocado and crispy wonton chips for a bold, refreshing appetizer

name: Svrljiški belmuž
description: A traditional Serbian dish made from creamy, freshly made cornmeal porridge, combined with rich, soft cheese and served with smoked meat or sausage for a comforting, rustic meal full of authentic flavors

name: Tang cu pai gu
description: A popular Chinese dish featuring tender, braised pork ribs cooked in a sweet and sour sauce made from soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, and spices, creating a perfect balance of flavors with a rich, sticky glaze

name: Tzatziki
description: A refreshing Greek dip made with creamy yogurt, cucumber, garlic, dill, and a touch of lemon, perfect for pairing with pita bread, fresh vegetables, or grilled meats

name: Yukhoe
description: A traditional Korean dish featuring thinly sliced raw beef, marinated in a sweet and savory mixture of soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, and sugar, topped with a raw egg yolk and garnished with julienned pear and sesame seeds for a delicate, flavorful experience

name: Apple Pie
description: A classic dessert featuring a buttery, flaky crust filled with tender, spiced apples and baked to golden perfection. Served warm, optionally with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for a comforting finish

name: Bananas Foste
description: A decadent dessert of caramelized bananas flambéed in a rich sauce of brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, dark rum, and banana liqueur, served warm over vanilla ice cream

name: Brownies
description: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownies with a crisp top and gooey center, made with premium cocoa and dark chocolate. Served warm and optionally topped with a scoop of ice cream or a drizzle of chocolate sauce

name: Cheesecake
description: A creamy, velvety-smooth classic cheesecake on a buttery graham cracker crust, served plain or topped with your choice of fresh berries, chocolate sauce, or fruit compote

name: Chocolate Ice Cream
description: A rich and creamy scoop of classic chocolate ice cream made with premium cocoa for a smooth, indulgent treat. Perfect on its own or paired with your favorite dessert

name: Creole Cream Cake
description: A moist and fluffy Southern-style cake layered with a rich, vanilla-infused custard cream, and topped with a light whipped frosting and a touch of toasted coconut or pecans for added texture and flavor

name: Doughnuts
description: Freshly fried and delightfully fluffy, these classic doughnuts are coated in sugar or glaze and offered in a variety of flavors including chocolate, cinnamon, and jelly-filled. Perfect for a sweet snack any time of day

name: Éclairs
description: Light and airy choux pastry filled with rich vanilla pastry cream and topped with a smooth, glossy chocolate glaze. A refined French classic perfect for any dessert lover

name: Fruit Salad
description: A refreshing medley of seasonal fresh fruits such as melon, berries, grapes, pineapple, and citrus, lightly tossed with a hint of mint and citrus juice for a bright, healthy finish

name: Gelato
description: An Italian-style frozen dessert known for its dense, silky texture and intense flavor. Available in a variety of classic and seasonal options such as pistachio, stracciatella, hazelnut, and fresh fruit sorbets

name: Honeycomb
description: A sweet and crunchy treat made from caramelized sugar and honey, creating a delicate, airy texture with a rich, natural honey flavor. Perfect on its own or as a topping for ice cream or desserts

name: Jelly Roll
description: A light, fluffy sponge cake rolled with a layer of sweet fruit jam, usually raspberry or strawberry, and dusted with powdered sugar for a delightful balance of softness and sweetness

name: Key Lime Pie
description: A tangy and creamy dessert made with fresh key lime juice, a buttery graham cracker crust, and topped with a dollop of whipped cream, offering a perfect balance of tartness and sweetness

name: Lemon Bars
description: Delicately sweet and tangy, these lemon bars feature a buttery shortbread crust topped with a smooth, zesty lemon filling, finished with a dusting of powdered sugar for the perfect balance of flavors

name: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: A classic dessert featuring a tangy lemon filling encased in a flaky pie crust, topped with a fluffy, golden-brown meringue. The perfect balance of sweet, tart, and creamy in every bite

name: Macarons
description: Delicate French cookies made with almond flour, filled with a variety of flavored buttercreams, ganaches, or jams. Available in an assortment of flavors, including vanilla, pistachio, raspberry, chocolate, and salted caramel

name: Napoleons
description: A decadent French pastry consisting of layers of flaky puff pastry filled with rich vanilla custard, topped with a glaze of icing and sometimes a drizzle of chocolate for an elegant and indulgent treat

name: Oatmeal Cookies
description: Chewy and hearty cookies made with wholesome oats, brown sugar, and a hint of cinnamon, often studded with raisins or chocolate chips for added texture and sweetness

name: Panna Cotta
description: A smooth and creamy Italian dessert made with vanilla-flavored cream, set to perfection and topped with a luscious berry compote or fresh fruit for a delicate and refreshing finish

name: Queen of Puddings
description: A classic British dessert made with a layer of custard, topped with a fluffy meringue and a layer of raspberry or strawberry jam. Baked to golden perfection for a comforting and indulgent treat

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: A moist, velvety cake with a hint of cocoa and vibrant red color, layered with smooth cream cheese frosting and topped with a sprinkle of cake crumbs for extra texture and flavor

name: Sorbet
description: A refreshing, dairy-free frozen dessert made from pureed fruit, sugar, and a touch of citrus for a bright, clean flavor. Available in a variety of seasonal fruit flavors such as lemon, raspberry, mango, and blood orange

name: Southern Pecan Pie
description: A rich and decadent dessert with a buttery, flaky crust, filled with a sweet, golden syrup filling and loaded with crunchy, toasted pecans. The flavor is a delightful balance of sweetness and nuttiness, with hints of vanilla and brown sugar. This Southern classic is perfect for any occasion

name: Texas Apple Cobbler
description: A warm, comforting dessert that combines tender, spiced apples with a buttery, biscuit-like topping. The apples are perfectly sweetened with cinnamon, nutmeg, and brown sugar, creating a rich, flavorful base, while the golden, slightly crispy topping adds a delightful texture. It's best served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a drizzle of caramel sauce for an extra indulgence

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert that features layers of delicate, espresso-soaked ladyfingers, nestled between creamy mascarpone cheese and a light dusting of cocoa powder. The balance of rich coffee flavor and sweet, creamy layers creates a perfectly indulgent treat. It's a sophisticated dessert that offers a hint of coffee bitterness with every bite, complemented by the smoothness of the mascarpone

name: Upside Down Cake
description: A moist, buttery cake topped with caramelized fruit, typically pineapples or berries, for a sweet, golden finish

name: Vanilla Pudding
description: A creamy, smooth dessert made with rich vanilla flavor, perfect for a comforting treat

name: Waffle
description: A crispy, golden-brown waffle with a light, fluffy interior, perfect for topping with syrup, fresh fruit, or whipped cream

name: Xocolatl
description: An ancient Mexican chocolate drink made with rich dark chocolate, spices like chili and cinnamon, and a hint of vanilla. This warm, indulgent beverage offers a bold, complex flavor with a subtle kick of heat

name: Yule Log
description: A festive, rolled sponge cake filled with rich chocolate ganache and decorated to resemble a traditional log, often adorned with powdered sugar and seasonal accents like holly or berries

name: Zeppole
description: Soft, fried Italian pastries dusted with powdered sugar and often filled with sweet ricotta or custard. Crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, these bite-sized treats are perfect for indulging
